hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:The Prophet (ﷺ) heard a man reciting the Qur'an in the mosque and said, "May Allah bestow His Mercy on him, as he has reminded me of such-and-such Verses of such a Surah

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ نِسْيَانِ الْقُرْآنِ وَهَلْ يَقُولُ نَسِيتُ آيَةَ كَذَا وَكَذَا
chapter.eng-name: Forgetting the Qur'an. And can one say: “I forgot such and such a Verse?

hadiths.text: Narrated Hisham:(The same Hadith as 6.556, adding): which I missed (modifying the Verses)

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ نِسْيَانِ الْقُرْآنِ وَهَلْ يَقُولُ نَسِيتُ آيَةَ كَذَا وَكَذَا
chapter.eng-name: Forgetting the Qur'an. And can one say: “I forgot such and such a Verse?
